articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: AI could unleash 'deep societal upheavals' that many elites are ignoring, Palantir CEO Alex Karp warns - Fortune
articles.description: "Those of us in tech cannot have a tin year to what is this going to mean for the average person."
articles.content: Jason Ma is the weekend editor at Fortune, where he covers markets, the economy, finance, and housing.
